item.description:
Tonight's Meetup is CANCELLED!!!!

Market Talk by Harlan Rieur


Harlan gives us his live market analysis on market trends. Using StockCharts.com and his own combination of indicators - Bollinger Bands, stochastic RSI, MACD, Williams%, OBV plus his 13/34 moving averages.

Stock Picks

Bring you tickers - we will analyze them on the fly.

Tips, Tricks and Techniques

Do you have something of value to share with your fellow traders?  Consider this an opportunity for an adult "Show & Tell".  If it's a website or a book, we can show it up on the screen.  If it's a special indicator, we can try to do that too within the limits of the platforms on my computer.  If you have something to show from your laptop, that's good, too.  Please try to keep your idea to 5 minutes or less.  If you have something that is longer, say a half hour or more, please see me or email me about doing your own presentation.

 

Our members value discussion highly. We try to pack as much discussion as possible. Expressing ideas and sharing knowledge is paramount to our members.
All levels of expertise are welcome. No question is too simple - as a matter of fact the simplest question often evokes the best discussion!

If you talk stocks with someone then bring them with you!

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

Make your own investment decisions! Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: CANCELLED!!!! - Boston Investor's Group Tuesday Meetup
